artists.name: Andreas Odbjerg
aboutText: ‚ÄúAndreas Odbjerg‚Äù is a live concert tour in Denmark celebrating the legendary Danish pop band T√∏sedrengene, which was active from 1978 to 1985.
The tour marks 40 years since the group disbanded, bringing back their music to both long-time fans and new audiences.

artists.name: Lukas Graham
aboutText: Lukas Graham is a Danish pop and soul band known for their heartfelt lyrics and catchy melodies.
The band, led by vocalist Lukas Forchhammer, has gained international fame with hits like '7 Years' and 'Love Someone'.
Their music often explores themes of personal growth, family, and life's challenges.

artists.name: Malte Ebert
aboutText: Malte Ebert is a Danish singer-songwriter known for his introspective lyrics and folk-inspired melodies.
His music captures the essence of everyday life with honest storytelling and acoustic arrangements.
Malte has quickly become one of Denmark's most promising artists in the contemporary folk scene.

artists.name: Medina
aboutText: Medina is a Danish pop and R&B artist who rose to international fame with her hit single 'You and I'.
Known for her powerful vocals and electronic pop sound, she has become one of Denmark's most successful music exports.
Her performances are characterized by high energy and emotional depth, captivating audiences worldwide.

artists.name: Gnags
aboutText: Gnags is a legendary Danish rock band that has been entertaining audiences since 1966.
With their unique blend of rock, pop, and folk, they've created some of Denmark's most beloved songs.
Known for hits like 'S√• Lykkelig' and 'Maria', Gnags continues to be a cornerstone of Danish music culture.

artists.name: Gilli
aboutText: Gilli is one of Denmark's most prominent hip-hop and rap artists, known for his energetic performances.
His music blends Danish and international hip-hop influences with catchy hooks and powerful beats.
With multiple chart-topping albums and singles, Gilli has established himself as a leading voice in Danish urban music.

4 AUG.message: Rise and shine, festival heroes! Breakfast beats start at 09:00 in the Camp Lounge.
4 AUG.title: GOOD MORNING ‚òÄÔ∏è

4 AUG.message: Left your water bottle somewhere? A big box of lost-and-found items is now at Info West.
4 AUG.title: LOST & FOUND üì¶

4 AUG.message: Protect those festival feet! Free sunscreen & blister plasters at the Safety Tent.
4 AUG.title: STAY SAFE üß¥

3 AUG.message: Get home safely in the rain, dear camping guests. Please follow the staff‚Äôs instructions.
3 AUG.title: GET HOME SAFELY

3 AUG.message: Thank you, thank you, thank you for making Ringsted Festival 2025 unforgettable ‚Äì see you in 2026!
3 AUG.title: THANK YOU FOR THIS YEAR üéâ

3 AUG.message: There is love-themed karaoke at the Love tent tonight.
3 AUG.title: ALL YOU NEED IS LOVE ‚ù§Ô∏è

3 AUG.message: Tonight's surprise guest has just arrived backstage üëÄ Stay tuned!
3 AUG.title: SURPRISE ACT ‚≠ê

3 AUG.message: Cold drinks incoming! Extra pop-up bars are opening near the Main Stage.
3 AUG.title: REFRESHMENTS üçª

3 AUG.message: The Silent Disco headphones are running low ‚Äì grab a pair early!
3 AUG.title: SILENT DISCO üéß

3 AUG.message: Charging stations are full right now. Next free slots expected in 20 minutes.
3 AUG.title: CHARGE UP üîã

3 AUG.message: Water refill points just restocked! Stay hydrated and enjoy the sun.
3 AUG.title: DRINK WATER üíß

3 AUG.message: A rainbow just appeared over the West Stage. Magical moment!
3 AUG.title: MAGIC MOMENT üåà

2 AUG.message: Look up at the sky at 00:15.
2 AUG.title: FIREWORKS üí•

2 AUG.message: Dear festival guest! When the clock strikes 00:15, there will be anniversary fireworks.
2 AUG.title: FIREWORKS üí•

2 AUG.message: The Vegan Street Food stall has a 2-for-1 deal until 17:00.
2 AUG.title: FOOD DEAL üå±

2 AUG.message: The sun is strong right now ‚Äì hats and sunscreen recommended at all stages.
2 AUG.title: SUN ALERT ‚òÄÔ∏è

2 AUG.message: Main Stage soundcheck for tonight‚Äôs headliner starts in 10 minutes.
2 AUG.title: SOUNDCHECK üé§

2 AUG.message: Meet & greet wristbands for the 18:00 session are now available at Info East.
2 AUG.title: MEET & GREET ü§ù

2 AUG.message: The Ferris wheel is temporarily closed due to wind ‚Äì safety first!
2 AUG.title: WEATHER UPDATE üå¨Ô∏è

2 AUG.message: Free glitter makeup at the Glam Booth until supplies run out.
2 AUG.title: GLAM TIME ‚ú®

2 AUG.message: Warm-up DJ set at Camp Central starts in 5 minutes!
2 AUG.title: MORNING BEATS üé∂

items.title: WRISTBANDS, TICKETS & ACCESS
items.script: const interval = setInterval(() => { let viewport = document.querySelector('meta[name="viewport"]'); const masthead = document.getElementById('masthead'); if (masthead) masthead.remove(); const footer = document.querySelector('footer'); if (footer) footer.remove(); const heroSection = document.querySelector('.entry-hero.page-hero-section.entry-hero-layout-standard'); if (heroSection) heroSection.remove(); const links = document.querySelectorAll('a[href]'); links.forEach(link => link.remove()); if (viewport) viewport.setAttribute('content','width=device-width, initial-scale=0.7, minimum-scale=0.7'); clearInterval(interval); }, 30);
